title: IOC called 'irresponsible' over qualifier in London after boxers test positive for virus
description: The IOC is called "irresponsible" by the Turkish boxing federation which says, two fighters and a coach have tested positive for coronavirus.
content:
The qualifying event was taking place at London's 2012 Olympics venue the Copper Box
The International Olympic Committee has been called "irresponsible" after the Turkish Boxing Federation said two fighters and a coach who took part in a Tokyo 2020 qualifyin… [+4307 chars]
